## 1. Load tidyverse and palmerpenguins
```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("palmerpenguins")
```

## 2.Dimensions of datasetpenguins
```{r}
dim(penguins)
```

## 3. Names of variables in penguins
```{r}
names(penguins)
```

## 4. How many individuals in each island
```{r}
table(penguins$island)
```

## 5.Mean body mass
```{r}
mean(penguins$body_mass_g, na.rm = T)
```
